original: 兗州任城人，曹魏將領。曹操初得兗州後，便徵闢呂虔為從事，治理泰山一帶，屢平賊亂。魏文帝、魏明帝即位，都有額外加封，頗受重用。
text: Yanzhou was appointed to the city, general Cao Wei. After Cao Cao first acquired Yanzhou, he enlisted Lu Qian as his job to govern the area around Mount Tai, repeatedly suppressing the chaos. Emperor Wei Wen and Emperor Wei Ming came to the throne, and both had additional seals, which were quite reused.
